MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G45 postcode area of Glasgow. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.09pm. Our engineers have arrived on site at the Castledown substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10.15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:39PM on Wednesday 13 January 2021.
